events.title: Bounce-A-Thon
events.content: Join us for an exhilarating Bounce-A-Thon, where participants can test their endurance with non-stop jumping fun! Perfect for all ages, this event supports local charities with every leap.

meta.description: Experience the ultimate jumping challenge at JumpArena's Bounce-A-Thon event in 2019. Support charity with every bounce!
meta.keywords: bounce-a-thon, trampoline event, charity jump, JumpArena 2019

events.title: Easter Egg Hunt
events.content: Hop into fun with our Easter Egg Hunt! Kids can search for hidden eggs across the park, enjoy trampoline games, and win exciting prizes. A springtime adventure awaits!

meta.description: Join JumpArena's Easter Egg Hunt 2019, featuring trampoline games and prizes for kids across the UK.
meta.keywords: easter egg hunt, trampoline park, kids event, JumpArena 2019

events.title: Emoji Weekend
